title: User Authentication System
scope: Implement complete user authentication system with registration, login, password reset, and email verification
acceptanceCriteria:
1. Users can register with email and password
2. Email verification link sent and verified
3. Login with credentials
4. Password reset flow working
5. JWT tokens implemented
6. Protected routes working

title: Product Catalog & Search
scope: Build product catalog with search, filtering, and pagination features
acceptanceCriteria:
1. Product listing page
2. Search functionality
3. Filter by category, price range
4. Pagination implemented
5. Responsive design

title: Payment Integration
scope: Integrate payment gateway with support for multiple payment methods including credit cards and mobile money
acceptanceCriteria:
1. Payment gateway integrated
2. Multiple payment methods supported
3. Transaction history implemented
4. Refund functionality working
5. Security measures in place

title: Data Pipeline & Backend API
scope: Build data pipeline for importing data from multiple sources and create RESTful API for dashboard access
acceptanceCriteria:
1. Data import pipeline working
2. RESTful API endpoints implemented
3. Database schema designed
4. Authentication integrated
5. API documentation complete

title: Interactive Dashboard UI
scope: Design and implement interactive dashboard with real-time charts, custom reports, and data visualization components
acceptanceCriteria:
1. Dashboard layout complete
2. Interactive charts working
3. Custom report builder
4. Real-time data updates
5. Responsive design
6. User role management

title: Design System & Wireframes
scope: Create design system and wireframes for the analytics dashboard
acceptanceCriteria:
1. Design system complete
2. Wireframes for all pages
3. User flows documented
4. Design approved

title: Frontend Implementation
scope: Implement frontend dashboard with React and D3.js visualizations
acceptanceCriteria:
1. Dashboard UI complete
2. D3.js charts working
3. Real-time updates implemented
4. Responsive design
5. Testing complete

title: Backend Integration & Testing
scope: Integrate backend API and complete testing
acceptanceCriteria:
1. Backend API integrated
2. All endpoints working
3. Unit tests complete
4. Integration tests complete
5. Performance optimized
